title: Adventure Digital Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Digital watch face for android Wear
description: A new digital face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional sport-watch.Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:â˜…           Digital timeâ˜…           Wear Analog battery indicatorâ˜…           Phone Analog battery indicatorâ˜…           Seconds Dialâ˜…           24 Hour Dialâ˜…           Customizable text logo in background (via companion app)â˜…           Customizable marker colors (via companion app)â˜…           Customizable dials colors (via companion app)â˜…           Date with month, day, year and weekâ˜…           Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drainâ˜…           Minimal Dimmed mode to extreme battery save â˜…           Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMoreâ€¢  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store LINK DEV PLAYSTOREâ€¢  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. descriptionHTML:
A new digital face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional sport-watch.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Digital time
★ Wear Analog battery indicator
★ Phone Analog battery indicator
★ Seconds Dial
★ 24 Hour Dial
★ Customizable text logo in background (via companion app)
★ Customizable marker colors (via companion app)
★ Customizable dials colors (via companion app)
★ Date with month, day, year and week
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Minimal Dimmed mode to extreme battery save
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store LINK DEV PLAYSTORE
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo

Doesn't run Unfortunately, BLC3CK Adventure has stopped. And it gives me an OK button. Only watch face to have ever done that. Over 100 watch faces I have tried. I'll redo the review after a fix.
